<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/identities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the identity credential value corresponding to the provided `ethAddress`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ethAddress","description":"The wallet address of the user.","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"description":"The wallet address of the user. The address is in EIP-55.","type":"string","example":"0xf9692336d7f37336c2061a545d8b2895b1415efe","title":"EthAddress"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"credentialJwt":{"description":"The verifiable credential in JWT format.","type":"string","example":"eyJraWQiOiJkaWQ6aW90YTpybXM6MHhhMTM2Yjk1YTFmMzc0ZWQwN2M1NDkzOTQ0ZmMwYWYyZjM5NmU3YzExNTAzNDhhZmJhZGVlYmI5ZmVkNjExYzMxI3BjT0lUbnUxSTBqSm9HM3JJNnFaZGtrVTVLaDUwNnctYnExc2t5QjBXOTAiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFZERTQSJ9..-6dTIWJUwmaOQq6IJz4hh3SEwBz2lKnUmY19av4nZY3wcTi7hp0TY2rn3G8vsMYIft4VFZCwSlAHi28GwpiBAQ"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"summary":"The updated identity","description":"The updated identity corresponding to the provided `ethAddress`.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"The id of the identity","type":"number","example":1},"ethAddress":{"description":"The wallet address of the user. The address is in EIP-55.","type":"string","example":"0xf9692336d7f37336c2061a545d8b2895b1415efe","title":"EthAddress"},"did":{"description":"A a new type of identifier that enables verifiable, decentralized digital identity.","type":"string","example":"did:iota:rms:0xb0a5c53953a28ad2f3880b09878265e98db0bd3f96d166b233ec84cdadbb242b","title":"Did"},"fragment":{"description":"Fragment of the identity key pair inside the DID document.","type":"string"},"credential":{"description":"The verifiable credential of the user in JWT format (Upon identity creation, its value is undefined, the credential must be requested to an Issuer).","type":"string"}},"title":"IdentityResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
